thread.section_title: Bigboxcars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bigboxcars | bigboxcars.com.au
thread.title: David & Mary

author: David & Mary
title: David & Mary
text:
Upon arriving we were greeted by Rob who made life so easy. We browsed without being annoyed. Decided on our new vehicle and took it for a test drive without any drama what so ever. After a very easy paperwork process Candice Quote: d us on insurance that was nearly half the price of what we had been Quote: d elsewhere ! What a deal !! As it was a very hot day we were plied with ice cold bottles of water regularly - nice touch. We left in our new vehicle with huge smiles and would highly recommend this new approach to buying cars to all.
We will be revisiting when we purchase our next vehicle = Many thanks to the Team at Big Box for a pleasurable experience
